SELECT p.id, p.author_id, p.channel_id, p.comments, p.create_time, p.favors, p.featured, p.STATUS, p.summary, p.tags, p.thumbnail, p.title, p.views, p.weight, p.update_time, p.create_time, pa.content, u.user_name "username", u.avatar, C.type "channelType", C.`name` "channelName" FROM mto_post p LEFT JOIN mto_post_attribute pa ON p.id = pa.id left join sys_user u on p.author_id = u.user_id left JOIN MTO_CHANNEL C ON C.ID = P.channel_id WHERE p.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and p.status = 0
